oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crayon print of Union Corporal William Henry King
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Large framed crayon print of Cpl. King, Co. B, 2nd Tenn. Cav. USA in Union frock coat. Born Jan. 18, 1832 in Wear's Valley in Sevier County, died Oct. 15, 1912 in same place. Company B of the 2nd Cav. Was organized by Capt. Thomas A. Jones at; Sevierville (Tenn.) on August 15, 1862.
